item.title: Small Business Idea: FlowAI: The Zero-Prompt Dev Assistant
item.content:encoded:
FlowAI: The Zero-Prompt Dev Assistant

Brief Description of the Idea

“FlowAI” is a lightweight desktop utility designed to augment a developer's workflow by providing instant, context-aware assistance from an AI, without the need for manual prompt engineering. It intelligently monitors your clipboard or acts on selected text, inferring common developer intents such as code explanation, error message analysis, or quick refactoring. The system then delivers AI-driven insights directly to you, minimizing interruptions and helping you stay in your coding
